title: White Elephant
body: Created for White Elephant by the fine folk at [PAM](https://pamstudio.co/), a Toulouse-based digital studio. > White Elephant crafts copy that feels human for brands with a knack for all things great. - Freelance French copywriting. Features include clean animations, strong typography & curved type, a fine use of color and some playful page loading throughout. [Take a look](https://www.white-elephant.fr/)!
